document_title: What disease is anal itching? Causes, symptoms and prevention
subsection_content:
Anal itching is a condition in which the skin in or around the anus becomes irritated, leading to uncomfortable itching. In most cases, it is usually a sign that this area is infected. The intensity of itching and the degree of inflammation tend to increase when the anus is directly damaged by scratching or exposure to moisture. In case the itching progresses intensely and appears with symptoms of pain and burning, the patient may not be able to bear it.(1)
Anal itching is divided into two main types, including:
Primary anal itching: This type is often the most common, with no clear cause.; Secondary anal itching: This type comes from many different causes such as infection, contact dermatitis...
